class.comment: Represents a direction of an @(net.minecraft.core.Direction$Axis) in 3D Space.

enumerations.name: POSITIVE
enumerations.comment: The positive direction along this axis.

enumerations.name: NEGATIVE
enumerations.comment: The negative direction along this axis.

step.comment: The step value of this direction.

params.name: step
params.comment: The step value of this direction.

constructors.comment: Constructs a new direction with the given step value and description.

opposite.comment: Returns the opposite direction along this axis.
